Description.text: UWaterloo Info Session is an unofficial iOS app used by students at University of Waterloo to query updated employer information sessions. Never look up the info session calendar again!

With this site you can see what other students think of their past co-op experiences and use that info to find the best position for you. At the end of the day we just want to help you find the most awesome co-op job ever!
Adds disruptive and innovative features to WaterlooWorks, improving its UI/UX.

Authors.text: Gurpreet Gill, Peyman Gardideh, Neil Lohana

Description.text: Azure is the best extension to enhance your experience of WaterlooWorks.
